definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
to fight/to combat/to seize/(of heart) to beat

sentences.english: Objective To enhance therapeutic efficiency of the implanted permanency cardiac pacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲提高安裝永久性心臟起搏器的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Biventricular pacemakers were initially approved for people with severe heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 雙腔起搏器最初被批准應用於嚴重心力衰竭的患者。

sentences.english: Most people stay in the hospital one to two days after a pacemaker is implanted.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，剛剛植入起搏器後要留在醫院觀察一兩天。

sentences.english: Seen here is the explanted heart. Pacemaker wires enter the right ventricle.
sentences.chinese: 請看這個移植心臟，起搏器金屬絲深入到右心室。
起搏器的價格十分昂貴。

sentences.english: Could getting a pacemaker have damaged my vagus nerve?
sentences.chinese: 安裝心臟起搏器，可能損害到迷走神經嗎？

sentences.english: A biventricular pacemaker can fix this problem.
sentences.chinese: 一個兩心室的起搏器可以解決這個問題。

sentences.english: VNS is like a pacemaker for the brain.
A kind of high-level embed pacemaker used in clinic was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種可供臨牀應用的高水平內藏式心臟起搏器。

sentences.english: A pacemaker is a small, battery-powered device that's usually implanted near your collarbone.
sentences.chinese: 起搏器是一種電池驅動的小玩意，植入鎖骨附近。

sentences.english: Most pacemakers removed before burial or cremations wind up in storage at funeral homes.
sentences.chinese: 在葬禮結束前，大多數起搏器被從保管處拿走。

sentences.english: This article briefly introduced rate-adaptive pacemaker and reviewed recent research progress in sensor(especially dual sensor), algorithm and implication of rate-adaptive pacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 頻率適應性起搏器是起搏器發展史上的重大進展。

sentences.english: This article briefly introduced rate-adaptive pacemaker and reviewed recent research progress in sensor(especially dual sensor), algorithm and implication of rate-adaptive pacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 頻率適應性起搏器是起搏器發展史上的重大進展。

sentences.english: Persons with heart pacemakers are not allowed to enter the powered-up locomotive.
sentences.chinese: 裝有心臟起搏器的人禁止進入已啓動的機車。

sentences.english: This thesis is about a new technology of program-controlled telemetry for pacemakers.
sentences.chinese: 討論一新型的起搏器程控遙測技術。

sentences.english: The very well known pacemaker is commonly used to regulate the heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知的起搏器通常被用來調節心跳。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
